headline.main: SCORES U.S. CENSORSHIP; Australian, Head of Foreign Correspondents, Asks Changes

lead_paragraph: S. Randal Heymanson of Melbourne, editor-manager of the Australian Newspapers Service, called last night for a liberalization of censorship affecting foreign correspondents.
abstract: US censorship comment by S R Heymanson
snippet: S. Randal Heymanson of Melbourne, editor-manager of the Australian Newspapers Service, called last night for a liberalization of censorship affecting foreign correspondents....
